document.title: Algemene Nederlandse Spraakkunst (e-ANS)
document.intro: The ANS (Algemene Nederlandse Spraakkunst - General Grammar of Dutch) aims to provide a most comprehensive description of Standard Dutch grammar (taking into account geographical and stylistic diversity), intended for a general public with interest in grammar and therefore not exclusive... Descriptions of grammatical issues.
